tool.name: Bioinformatics Pipeline v1.2
tool.description: Detect and/or annotate variants from IonTorrent data
tool.command:
#if $mode_select.mode=="Variant_Detection" Variant_Detection.py --galaxy_html_file $html_file --galaxy_output_directory $html_file.files_path --ion_reporter_version $mode_select.version --regions $mode_select.regions -c $mode_select.base_output -t $mode_select.url_or_local_bam.tumor_bam -n $mode_select.url_or_local_bam.normal_bam --tumor-purity=$mode_select.tumor_purity --normal-purity=$mode_select.normal_purity -p $mode_select.platform -s $mode_select.status #else Variant_Detection.py --galaxy_html_file $html_file --galaxy_output_directory $html_file.files_path --annotation_mode -c $mode_select.base_output -v $mode_select.varscan_vcf --ion_reporter_tsv=$mode_select.ionreporter_tsv --ion_reporter_vcf=$mode_select.ionreporter_vcf #end if #if $mode_select.url_or_local_bam.url_or_local_select=="url" --url #end if #if $mode_select.url_or_local_ionreporter.url_or_local_ionreporter_select=="url" --ionreporter_url_bool --ionreporter_analysis_name=$mode_select.url_or_local_ionreporter.ionreporter_analysis_name --ionreporter_id=$mode_select.url_or_local_ionreporter.ionreporter_id #else --ion_reporter_vcf=$mode_select.url_or_local_ionreporter.ionreporter_vcf --ion_reporter_tsv=$mode_select.url_or_local_ionreporter.ionreporter_tsv #end if #if $mode_select.url_or_local_ionreporter_fusion.url_or_local_ionreporter_fusion_select=="url" --ionreporter_fusion_url_bool --ionreporter_fusion_analysis_name=$mode_select.url_or_local_ionreporter_fusion.ionreporter_fusion_analysis_name --ionreporter_fusion_id=$mode_select.url_or_local_ionreporter_fusion.ionreporter_fusion_id #else if $mode_select.url_or_local_ionreporter_fusion.url_or_local_ionreporter_fusion_select=="local" --ion_reporter_fusion_vcf=$mode_select.url_or_local_ionreporter_fusion.ionreporter_fusion_vcf #else
#end if

param.name: base_output
param.label: Base output name for files.
param.help: If CoPath ID exists, it is suggested you use this for base output name.

param.name: tumor_purity
param.label: Tumor purity
param.help: Enter tumor tissue purity from 0 to 1

param.name: normal_purity
param.label: Normal purity
param.help: Enter normal tissue purity from 0 to 1.

param.name: url_or_local_select
param.label: Please choose whether BAM input will be from URL or a locally uploaded BAM

param.name: normal_bam
param.label: Normal bam
param.help: If no normal bam is selected, please import a Population Normal bam from the 'Data Libraries' option that is appropriate for your platform.

param.name: url_or_local_ionreporter_select
param.label: Please choose whether IonReporter input will be from URL or a locally uploaded VCF

param.name: url_or_local_ionreporter_fusion_select
param.label: FUSION SPECIFIC PARAMETER: Please choose whether Fusion input from IonReporter will be URL or locally uploaded VCF

param.name: base_output
param.label: Base output name for files.
param.help: If CoPath ID exists, it is suggested you use this for base output name.

tool.help: This tool is a wrapper script for variant annotation and detection using the IonTorrent data. The tool can be run in two modes: (1) Variant Detection and Annotation or (2) Variant Annotation only. The first mode required four files for input: tumor and normal BAMs, IonReporter vcf, and IonReporter tsv. For annotation only mode, three files are submitted as input: varscan vcf, IonReporter vcf, and IonReporter tsv. PLEASE NOTE: The IonReporter vcf contains formatting errors and must be corrected before running through this pipeline.
